member.name: T:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy
member.summary: Fake TurnTable Hardware Proxy for educational purpose ( and debug too ;) ) in this cas the plugin implement also the provider and the hardwareproxy it is interesting when you don't have any configuration to make ( if you can only select one hardware, whitout any parameter)
member.remarks: In this cas the object derive from AbstractProxyProvider<ITurnTableProxy> a abstract class that implement some function for a ITurnTableProxy provider

member.name: M:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.Rotate(System.Double,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Rotate the Table

member.name: M:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.InitialiseRotation
member.summary: Reinit the rotation (ie set 0Â° to the current position)

member.name: M:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.MinimumRotation
member.summary: Retreave the minimum rotation of the table

member.name: M:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose your Hardware proxy

member.name: M:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.LoadFromHardwareId(System.String)
member.summary: Load a IHardwareProxy with a specific HardwareId
member.returns: the loaded IHardwareProxy or null if you can't reload it

member.name: M:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.GetViewer
member.summary: Get the associated Viewer of these IHardwareProxy the viewer allow the user to interact with or tweak the hardware. you can return null if there is no setting or viewer

member.name: M:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.Select(System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window)
member.summary: This function is call when the user request a instance of ther IHardwareProxy You can call winforms to as information ( Com port, configuration etc)
member.returns: a IHardwareProxy if one is selected, Null in case of cancle or not disponible

member.name: P:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.MotorEnabled
member.summary: Enable disable motor

member.name: P:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.HardwareId
member.summary: A unique id to identify a specific instance of IHardwareProxy (mainly used for reload a IHardwareproxy, so store all the properties)

member.name: P:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeTurnTableProxy.Name
member.summary: Display name of the Provider, for the user to know what he select;)

member.name: T:FakeHardwarePlugins.FakeLaserProxyProvider
member.summary:
Sample of IHardwareProxyProvider Education and debug purpose sample plugin
a plusgin is composed of 2 parts A IHardwareProxyProvider and the IHardWareProxy (ILaserProxy in this case)
IHardwareProxyProvider is the creator of the IHardwareProxy It main purpose is to create the instance of the IHardwareProxy by proposing a visual interface, or send directly the instance if no configuration is necessary

member.summary: This function is call when the user request a instance of ther IHardwareProxy You can call winforms to as information ( Com port, configuration etc)
member.returns: a IHardwareProxy if one is selected, Null in case of cancle or not disponible

member.summary: for the user to know ;)

member.summary: tell what type of IHardwareProxy the provider deliver
